amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to administer the "Yucca Mountain Youth Zone" website.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to administer the "Yucca Mountain Youth Zone" website.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berkley amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Berkley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Berkley amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
